html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07432012-05-31,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1633 – Food Additives)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1633 – FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to permit the use of calcium lactate and calcium chloride in fresh comminuted meat for sausages with an edible coating, at a maximum level of use of 1% of final product weight for calcium lactate and at a maximum level of use of 0.5% of final product weight for calcium chloride to stabilize the edible coatings.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0111 Publication Date: 2012-06-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1633 – Food Additives)
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1633 – FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to permit the use of calcium lactate and calcium chloride in fresh comminuted meat for sausages with an edible coating, at a maximum level of use of 1% of final product weight for calcium lactate and at a maximum level of use of 0.5% of final product weight for calcium chloride to stabilize the edible coatings.
